#summary The discussion groups used in development discussions.

= Phreedom Discussion Groups =

*phreedom-wishlist* http://groups.google.com/group/phreedom-wishlist

For developers and users helping with development. Anyone can subscribe to this group. Any user in good standing with the support forum may have post access.

*phreedom-roadmap* http://groups.google.com/group/phreedom-roadmap

For developers and users helping with development. Anyone can subscribe to this group. Any user in good standing with the support forum may have post access.

*phreedom-development* http://groups.google.com/group/phreedom-development

For developers helping with development. Anyone can subscribe to this group. Only developers approved by project manager may have post access.
